New Records: Rohit Sharma scored 87, the highest score for India in the match
Shami took 4 wickets for 22 runs, a key bowling performance
Key Match Events: England collapsed from 122-9 to 129-9, a dramatic turn of events
India defended 10 runs in the final over to secure a 100-run win
Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma emphasized the importance of partnerships and experience in their strategy
India aimed to extend their lead in the tournament standings
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma expressed satisfaction with the win and highlighted the team's resilience
India's victory boosted their confidence ahead of the World Cup
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch conditions were challenging, affecting both teams' performances
India's bowling discipline and spin contributions were crucial to their victory
